title: Colorado Gov. Polis offers Mickey Mouse 'asylum' as he urges Disney to leave Florida - New York Post
content: Colorado Gov. Polis offers Mickey Mouse 'asylum' as he urges Disney to leave Florida  New York Post
description: Colorado Gov. Jared Polis is openly lobbying The Walt Disney Co. and Twitter to relocate to his state after recent run-ins with Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis.
